Message:
A rumor spread
about me being a witch.

About me invoking a curse
that turns children
into witches... I know.

I suspected this would happen.
I just knew it would be
my turn one day.

After all,
if this town had a trigger,

it would gladly let its sparks
burst into flames.

It’s just that no one knew
what would become a spark.

I was met with scornful eyes,
sneering voices, and words
that cut like a blade.

One after another,
they all pierced
deep into my heart...

Soon afterwards,
I was reported to knights,
who then came to arrest me.

Behind them were
the parents of my students...

and among them,
parents of children
rumored to be witches.

As they stood on
the verge of tears,
they said to me,

“Give us back our children,
you damn witch.”
I was at a loss for words...

The pain they suffered
from losing their children
nearly broke my heart.
I had no idea what to say...
